Mohammad Javad Zarif is Iranian foreign minister .

Five Americans released after being monitored for Ebola in West Africa .

Yahya Rashid, a UK national from northwest London, was arrested at Luton airport .
He's been charged with engaging in conduct in preparation of acts of terrorism .
Rashid is due to appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on Wednesday .

Paul Walker was 40 when he died in a car crash in November 2013 .
Walker was on break from filming "Furious 7" at the time of the accident .
Producers decided not to kill off Walker's character in the film .

Anne Frank died of typhus in a Nazi concentration camp at age 15 .
New research shows she died at least a month earlier than previously thought .
Researchers re-examined archives of the Red Cross, the International Training Service .

Indiana Gov. Mike Pence signs religious freedom law that opens door to discrimination .
Pence's move has sparked a backlash, but it's also helped him with conservative base .
GOP hopefuls are now forced to take a position on same-sex marriage .

Vince Neil's rendition of "The Star-Spangled Banner" was a disaster .
Whitney Houston's rendition of "The Star-Spangled Banner" was a classic .
Roseanne Barr's rendition of "The Star-Spangled Banner" was a disgrace .

Walmart emerges as a bellwether for shifting public opinion on gay rights .
The company's opposition to religious freedom laws in Arkansas, Indiana .

Amnesty International releases its annual review of the death penalty worldwide .
Much of it makes for grim reading, with governments using the death penalty .
Amnesty says governments must join the vast majority of countries which have dropped it .

Robert H. Schuller, 88, founder of "Hour of Power" and Crystal Cathedral .

The United States and its negotiating partners reached a very strong framework .
The framework limits Iran's nuclear program in such a way as to block a bomb .
The framework agreement includes Iran's ratification of the Additional Protocol .
The agreement should be judged on its merits, not on dubious assumptions .

California drought hurts the rest of the nation, too .
California is a breadbasket to the nation, growing more than a third of its veggies .
Prices rose last year for berries, broccoli, grapes, melons, packaged salad and peppers .
Economists don't know yet whether farmers will plant fewer crops because of drought .
